original_text: If anyone refuses to accept this, you should not accept that person. If anyone refuses to accept this, you should not accept that person.
korean_text: 만일 누구든지 알지 못하면 그는 알지 못한 자니라

sentences.original_text: If anyone refuses to accept this
you should not accept that person
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그 사람을 받아들이지 말아야 한다

sentences.original_text: If anyone refuses to accept this

sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그 사람을 받아들이지 말아야 한다
